Quotes: "Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere." - Albert Einstein
"Society lives by faith, and develops by science" - Henri Frederic Amiel
"Research is what I'm doing when I don't know what I'm doing." - Wernher von Braun
"All this worldly wisdom was once the unamiable heresy of some wise man." - Henry David Thoreau
"Science gives us knowledge, but only philosophy can give us wisdom." - Will Durant
"The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination." - Albert Einstein
"All sciences are vain and full of errors that are not born of Experience" - Leonardo da Vinci
"Science gives us knowledge, but only philosophy can give us wisdom." - Will Durant
"A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge." - Thomas Carlyle
"Every new opinion, at its starting, is precisely in a minority of one." - Thomas Carlyle
